page.title: 03SNOWDOWN_THE LAMPROOM.
page.content: In the lamproom you are not allowed to smoke because of the gasses in there. All the lamps are numbered so that if you are missing you can be easily identified.Every miner has a life preserver which gives enough air to last for one and a half hours, long enough to get to the nearest ventilation place. All the miners are issued with dust masks which have a filter to prevent the dust going into their lungs. When the miners finish their shift the lamp batteries are put onto charge. There is a dip beam for talking to people so as not to dazzle them.
